QuestData.Title: Skulltakers in Crimson Fen
QuestData.Description: Grulkor and his group are often not seen for weeks, returning only when they can carry no more trophies and supplies. He has been gone too long this time.$b$bHe mentioned hunting in the Crimson Fen for the first time, see if he still lives.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Grulkor near the Crimson Fen in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: Marrow sent you, eh? Well we leave when I'm done here.
